text: Dauda Izobo (born 20 June 1980) is a Nigerian amateur boxer. ==Career== Izobo qualified for the 2008 Olympics at Light-heavyweight at the 2nd AIBA African 2008 Olympic Qualifying Tournament. He lost his semi-final to Bastir Samir (4:10), but defeated Domfack Adjoufack to win the third spot. ==External links== *Qualifier *Dauda Izobo's profile at ESPN Sports Category:1980 births Category:Living people Category:Light-heavyweight boxers Category:Boxers at the 2008 Summer Olympics Category:Olympic boxers of Nigeria Category:Nigerian male boxers
title: Dauda Izobo
